ComicInfo.Series: Batman / Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary: Greener on the Other Side: Batman, Robin, and Batgirl team up with the Turtles to fight Poison Ivy and Snakeweed. Then the heroes split up to face two separate threats. Meanwhile The Joker and Harley are plotting with The Shredder and his team.
